record.createRecord: INSERT INTO historia (id_paciente, desc_historia, id_doctor) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) RETURNING *
record.updateRecord: UPDATE historia SET desc_historia = $1 WHERE id_historia = $2

auth.register: INSERT INTO usuario ( name, email, password, profile) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) RETURNING *

security.checkAdminExists: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM security.user usr WHERE usr.user_na = 'administrador'
security.createAdminProfile: INSERT INTO security.profile (profile_na) VALUES ('admin') RETURNING profile_id
security.createAdminUser: INSERT INTO security.user (user_na, user_pass_va) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING user_id
